channel.title: KirkLurkPU x Ben Vacca - Game Over [Video Game Music] (V√¶ri√©ty EP)
channel.description:
[KirkLurkPU x Ben Vacca - Game Over [Video Game Music] (V√¶ri√©ty EP) ](https://soundcloud.app.goo.gl/xoqLyAhqnQNVEhLq5) ![image|500x500](upload://6n6QWAQlUNdZC5BkEImOa0Bzi9J.jpeg)
Thanks to Ben Vacca as my very first collaboration within the Auxy community. Ben Vacca walked out of his comfort zone, and of course it's kind of hard to communicate at first, since I'm not used to bouncing a project back and forth. This song is experimental and I also want to thancc him for making 100% flesh of the endoskeleton, and I did the details. üòµ
Make sure to check out @BenVacca, he's awesome, and check out the rest of the songs in my SoundCloud "V√¶ri√©ty EP" at KirkLurkPU.
Thanks again!
